title: How long does it take to write 500 words? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are multiple types of content and domains. So it would be wrong to set a particular time frame by generalizing everything. The right way of approaching your question would be by answering a few other questions that would eventually give you your answer. How long do you take to research? - You might or might not have enough information about the given topic. It takes a certain amount of time to accumulate relevant information from various sites.How long do you take to create the outline? - Now that you have the information and you know what to write, you need to figure out how to proceed with it. Creating an outline is important as it gives you a framework.How long do you take to write? - This involves writing the 500-word content.How long do you take to check the plagiarism and grammar? - As a writer, you need to ensure that your content is not plagiarised and its grammatically correct.So, the time factor gets decided by all of the above points. Your goal should be to create good content and its okay to take some time for the same.

Being a learning writer it takes about 5 minutes to write down 500 words after the research and all the data is collected. All I have to do is write it down. But if am writing and along with that am also doing the research, then it takes me to write 500 words in almost 15 minutes because that time I would be thinking where to place all the data I am collecting I have to edit it or also reedit it, check my grammar mistakes, and also read properly before submitting it. Hence you can see how much effort and time it takes to write 500 words without being prepared to write.
